Our Vision

the dawn of a
new era

We stand at the frontier of transformation. Where artificial intelligence meets human ingenuity, and where Zuma Indonesia leads the future of operations.

Single Source of Truth

One centralized platform where all teams access accurate, real-time information.

AI-First Operations

Intelligence embedded in every workflow, decision, and process from day one.

Continuous Improvements

Self-optimizing systems that learn from every interaction and evolve constantly.

Agentic Workflows

AI agents that handle complex tasks autonomously, from start to finish without human intervention.

What We Do

building the future,
now

Four pillars. One mission. Transforming how Zuma operates through intelligent systems.

AI Powered Apps

Smart tools for every team

Custom applications that think, learn, and adapt to your workflow.

AI Assistants

Your 24/7 digital workforce

Intelligent agents that handle tasks, answer questions, and boost productivity.

Auto Workflows

Repetitive work, automated

Self-running processes that eliminate manual steps and human error.

Data Strategy

Decisions backed by intelligence

Turn raw data into actionable insights that drive smarter moves.

FAQ

Everything you need to know about the Frontier Project.

Want the full story?

Download our comprehensive pitch deck for detailed project information, timelines, and strategic vision.

Download Pitch Deck

The Frontier Project is Zuma Indonesia's initiative to integrate AI across all operations. We're building intelligent systems, automating workflows, and creating AI assistants to transform how we work.

Currently, the AI tools and applications are available to Zuma Indonesia employees. Each department has tailored solutions designed for their specific workflows and needs.

AI handles repetitive tasks, provides instant insights from data, and assists with complex decisions. This means less manual work, fewer errors, and more time for strategic thinking.

Absolutely. All AI systems operate within Zuma's secure infrastructure. We use enterprise-grade security, data stays within our controlled environment, and all access is logged and monitored.

We're rolling out capabilities in phases. The Branch Super App is already live. Warehouse and AI assistants are in development. Check the Roadmap section for detailed timelines.

Contact the Continuous Improvement Team through the form below or reach out directly. We're always looking for departments ready to pilot new AI solutions.
